author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION BECOMES TROPICAL STORM ERICK... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW...
summary: ...DEPRESSION BECOMES TROPICAL STORM ERICK... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW... As of 3:00 AM CST Tue Jun 17 the center of Erick was located near 11.9, -93.6 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION BECOMES TROPICAL STORM ERICK... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TOMORROW... As of 3:00 AM CST Tue Jun 17 the center of Erick was located near 11.9, -93.6 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Erick (EP5/EP052025)
